Tiger Jump.name: Tiger Jump
Tiger Jump.fullText:
Snow Tiger Attack 11Tiger Jump

You hurl yourself at your enemy with knives raised, dragging your foe to the ground before falling upon it with a deadly strike.

Encounter        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Requirement: You must be wielding two light blades.

Target: One creature

Primary Attack: Strength vs. Fortitude (main weapon)

Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. You can fall prone and make a secondary attack against the target.

  Secondary Attack: Strength vs. AC (off-hand weapon)

  Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.


Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 53.
Tiger Jump.flavor: You hurl yourself at your enemy with knives raised, dragging your foe to the ground before falling upon it with a deadly strike.
Tiger Jump.requirement: You must be wielding two light blades.
Tiger Jump.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. You can fall prone and make a secondary attack against the target.
Tiger Jump.secondaryOnHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Tiger Jump.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Slashing Frenzy.name: Slashing Frenzy
Slashing Frenzy.fullText:
Snow Tiger Attack 20Slashing Frenzy

You dive into the middle of your foes, slashing wildly with your blades. The sheer speed and ferocity of your attack terrifies enemies that survive it.

Daily        Fear, Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Close burst 2

Requirement: You must be wielding two light blades.

Target: Each enemy in the burst you can see

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, each target you hit takes a penalty to attack rolls equal to the number of targets you hit with this power.


Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 53.
Slashing Frenzy.flavor: You dive into the middle of your foes, slashing wildly with your blades. The sheer speed and ferocity of your attack terrifies enemies that survive it.
Slashing Frenzy.requirement: You must be wielding two light blades.
Slashing Frenzy.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Slashing Frenzy.effect: Until the end of your next turn, each target you hit takes a penalty to attack rolls equal to the number of targets you hit with this power.

Iron Resolve.name: Iron Resolve
Iron Resolve.fullText:
Snow Tiger Utility 12Iron Resolve

Your enemy’s blow fuels your resolve.

Encounter        Healing, Martial
Immediate Reaction      Personal

Trigger: An enemy hits you

Effect: You can either spend a healing surge to regain hit points, or you can spend a healing surge but not regain any hit points and make a saving throw with a +2 bonus.


Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 53.
Iron Resolve.flavor: Your enemy’s blow fuels your resolve.
Iron Resolve.effect: You can either spend a healing surge to regain hit points, or you can spend a healing surge but not regain any hit points and make a saving throw with a +2 bonus.
